title: Bug 121323XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
OB: Bug 121323XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information If one enters an XPath expression for the column mapping with a selectionpart like section[@id='left'] then within class RelationInformation theselection is stripped of and stored in filterInfo HashMap.When leaving the dialog, RelationInformation gets persited to .rptdesignbutdata stored in filterInfo is lost.HoweverIMHO treating XPath expressions in that way will lead to a lotof trouble.
EB: Why can't we use the plain XPath expression (of course prependedwith the path from the data set selector itself) and let filtering be somethingfor those which need it?Kind regards,Herbert
